message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value is at least $8000 to me.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $8500 for the item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8750. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your position, Alice. I've considered your latest offer, and I believe we can find a mutually beneficial solution. I would like to propose an offer of $8600 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $8600. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $8700. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.

I understand your position, Alice. I've carefully considered your last offer and I believe we can come to a reasonable agreement. I would like to propose an offer of $8650 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range and allows us to move forward.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $8650. I'm willing to make one final compromise and offer it to you for $8725. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.
